About Me

👋Hi, I'm Juan Arana Olalde and I studied computer application development and computer systems administration along with different courses to complete my training.

🛤️Since 2006 I have been participating in different Java and j2ee projects with differents FRONTS and BDs, carrying out fullstack tasks, development, analysis, requirements gathering, estimates, migrations, tests, deployments, incidents, dealing with clients...
